GSD.product_version: versions from v2.6.22 to before v5.17.14
GSD.description:
rxrpc: Fix locking issue

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.17.14 by commit 30f0c3be083c584ad5143113d16ceaa58966cf44, it was introduced in version v2.6.22 by commit 17926a79320afa9b95df6b977b40cca6d8713cea. For more details please see the references link.
